name: Project ELM
description:
The world has been in a rather peaceful state during this time. Minor groups and individuals are fighting for control of the small colony of Domum. But these little quarrels are nothing to the growing shadows that lay beneath the surface of not only Domum, but the whole world. Factions will arise and the horns of war will begin. Will you join the fight?    

Project ELM is a 3D fantasy voxel-style network-based shooter game with a roadmap to become an MMORPG allowing players to connect and play together in an online 3D world. 

Features:
  • Created in Unity3D with C# and Unity Networking
  • Third-Person Camera Controls
  • 3D Platforming Environment
  • Character Select with 4 Character Classes
  • Server Browser
  • Spell Weapon Combat
  • Work-In-Progress Experience Levelling System
  • Original Music and Sound Effects

Currently the game supports up to 10 players in a game, with 2 people able to host their own games at a time. You can control your character with the mouse and keyboard.

Presented by Evan Leider, Liam Owens and Mathew Mallory
